Bash(git tag -a v1.3.1 -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Release v1.3.1 - Critical Bug Fix: Token Extraction

CRITICAL BUG FIX: Fixes token extraction which was completely broken in v1.3.0

## What Was Broken
The plugin was not extracting ANY tokens from Figma files. All extraction
methods failed with errors:
- Failed to populate variable registry
- Failed to extract variables  
- Failed to extract color tokens
- Failed to extract component tokens
- Result: 0 tokens extracted

## Root Cause
The plugin used documentAccess: "dynamic-page" which requires explicitly
loading pages before accessing content. Our token extractor tried to access
styles and components directly without loading pages first.

## The Fix
Changed documentAccess from "dynamic-page" to "current-page" which allows
direct access to the current page''s content. This is the correct mode for
a design token extractor.

## Impact
✅ Plugin now successfully extracts all tokens from Figma files
✅ Colors, typography, spacing, effects, and variables all working
✅ GitHub push functionality working correctly

This is a critical update - all v1.3.0 users should upgrade immediately.

For detailed changes, see commit 0a6e414
EOF
)")
